title: Call of Duty Modern Warfare 2 Multiplayer Cracked LAN
description:
How To Play Call Of Duty Modern Warfare 2 multiplayer Lan Offline steamless Using Tunngle.

Firts of all you need to dl this version of alteriwnet after that dl the dlc and the missing files and emulator

--> make new folder name it "MW2" and extract
--> extract AlterIWNet FIX to the game folder;extract main folder to main ;extract english folder to english
--> extract the files inside english folder to MW2zoneenglish; extract aIW.dll to the game root folder
--> Old school babycarlos emulator for the Host , all you need to do is place your Tunngle Ip in the alterIWnet.ini and send your Tunngle Ip to the client that needs to place it in his alterIWnet.ini
host needs to run emulator and start game client needs to start the game and "connet xx xx xx xx" through the console because the connect command is enabled in this version .Ã‚Â°) XD or join the host from in game if he knows what game type the host is running.
